release.author: Xavier BONNIN <xavier.bonnin@obspm.fr>, Sonny LION <sonny.lion@obspm.fr>, ROC Team <roc.support@sympa.obspm.fr>
release.modification: Update python dev deps and README

tasks.name: idb_set_current
tasks.description: Set the given version of the IDB as current

tasks.name: idb_set_trange
tasks.description: Set the validity time range of the given IDB

tasks.name: idb_load_idb
tasks.description: Load the IDB information into the ROC database

tasks.name: idb_load_palisade_metadata
tasks.description: Parse and load palisade metadata into the ROC database

tasks.name: idb_install
tasks.description: Download and install the selected IDB source/version

tasks.name: idb_export_sequences
tasks.description: Export the MIB sequences as CSV and/or XLS

tasks.name: idb_load_sequences
tasks.description: Load the MIB sequences into the MUSIC database

tasks.name: idb_load_idb_dump
tasks.description: Load IDB SQL dump file into the ROC database

tasks.name: idb_clear_release
tasks.description: Clear a given IDB release from the ROC database (palisade_metadata table entries and IDB source files will not be deleted)
